author: apetkovi1
body: This PR is to add Run3 HZZ electron ID. I have tested the changes privately with [1](https://github.com/apetkovi1/cmssw/blob/Run3_HZZelectronID_V1p1/RecoEgamma/ElectronIdentification/test/testElectronMVARun3_cfg.py). Please, test it with this PR [2](https://github.com/cms-data/RecoEgamma-ElectronIdentification/pull/28), since it hasn't been merged yet (weights are available at [3](https://github.com/apetkovi1/RecoEgamma-ElectronIdentification/tree/Winter22HZZweights/MVAWeightFiles/Winter22HZZV1))
title: Run3 HZZ electron ID
